item.title: Reflections on the Birmingham Decarbonisation Summer School (BDSS)
item.description: Group Photo on Day one in BDSS I attended the Birmingham Decarsbonisation Summer School (BDSS) two weeks ago. It was 5 amazing days in the beautiful and historic University of Birmingham. I met some brilliant PhD researchers and post-docs during the event. Industrial experts from National Grid, SSEN, GE Vernova, and many more gave very technical talks. I learnt an awful of insights and knowledge about electrical power system and the challenges the UK’s National Grid (NG) is facing in the renewable energy era.
